article_text:
Hillary Clinton has promised to continue the Obama Administration’s carbon cleanse of the U.S. economy, which is proving to be politically toxic in coal country. So this week she rolled out a plan for government to rescue the coal miners who the government has put out of work.

Coal production nationwide has declined by about 15% since 2008. A Duke University study in April estimated that 50,000 coal jobs were lost between 2008 and...

twitter.description: Clinton’s Coal Reparations: First put miners out of work. Then put them on the taxpayer dime, the Wall Street Journal writes in an editorial.
twitter.title: Clinton’s Coal Reparations

image.alt: Clinton’s Coal Reparations: Put miners out of work, then put them on the taxpayer dime.

article_summary:
A Duke University study in April estimated that 50,000 coal jobs were lost between 2008 and...
So this week she rolled out a plan for government to rescue the coal miners who the government has put out of work.
Hillary Clinton has promised to continue the Obama Administration’s carbon cleanse of the U.S. economy, which is proving to be politically toxic in coal country.
Coal production nationwide has declined by about 15% since 2008.
